summary: A writer of horror stories is invited to a "monster club" by a mysterious old gentleman. There, three gruesome stories are told to him; between each story some musicians play their songs.
cast: Vincent Price|John Carradine|Anthony Steel|Roger Sloman|Fran Fullenwider|The Viewers|B.A. Robertson|Night|The Pretty Things|Suzanna Willis|Barbara Kellerman|Simon Ward|James Laurenson|Geoffrey Bayldon|Donald Pleasence|Richard Johnson|Britt Ekland|Warren Saire|Anthony Valentine|Neil McCarthy|Stuart Whitman|Lesley Dunlop|Patrick Magee|Skip Alan|Sean Barry-Weske|Tony Clarkin|Jill Goldston|Prentis Hancock|Barrie Holland|Stevie Lange|Phil May|Cathy Munroe|John Normington|John Povey|Pat Roach|John Simpkin|Liz Smith|Vic Tablian|Dick Taylor|Chris Thompson|Peter Tolson|Wally Waller|Hugh Walters|Fred Wood|James Wynn
title: El club de los monstruos
